measured_by: ecological momentary self-report of alcoholic drinks list
justification: Under "EMA self-reports" participants reported amounts of 19 types of alcoholic drinks every two days, and these answers were converted into daily standard-drink totals.
The mixed model includes "stress refers to (mean) aggregated self-reported stress," indicating stress was captured via participant self-ratings.
